alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Hendry; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 20 at 1:55PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Collier County through 245 PM EDT... At 155 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Copeland to near Royal Palm Hammock to near Belle Meade. Movement was north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Naples, Marco Island, Golden Gate Estates, Belle Meade, Golden Gate, East Naples, Lely Resort, Copeland, Vineyards, Royal Palm Hammock, Marco Island Airport, Naples Manor, West Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, North Naples, Lely, Rookery Bay Aquatic Preserve, Fakahatchee Strand State Preserve, Intersection I-75 And Everglades Blvd, Miles City and Fiddlers Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
